# Describe the bug

What do you think is wrong?

# Steps to reproduce

# Log files

Use a service like hastebin.com or attach a file if it is big

# Configuration file

Located in /etc/maddy/maddy.conf by default, don't forget to remove DB passwords
and other security-related stuff.
